content:
StoppedEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the Stopped event.

In this Article

public delegate void StoppedEventHandler(object sender, StoppedEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
StoppedEventHandler
